head.citation-title: Bohr theorems for slice regular functions over octonions
head.abstracts: © The Author(s), 2020. Published by Cambridge University Press on behalf of The Royal Society of EdinburghIn this paper, we mainly investigate two versions of the Bohr theorem for slice regular functions over the largest alternative division algebras of octonions O. To this end, we establish the coefficient estimates for self-maps of the unit ball of O and the Carathéodory class in this setting. As a further application of the coefficient estimate, the 1/2-covering theorem is also proven for slice regular functions with convex image.
